name: Chaser
summary: Chaser is a first-person shooter action video game developed by Cauldron and published by JoWooD Productions. The game is built on the CloakNT 3D engine. It was re-released on Steam and GOG.com in 2011.
info:
• 中文名: 猎人
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: FPS
  • 游戏引擎: CloakNT
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2003年8月30日
